DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety four interventional pulmonology technique treatment fibrotic central airway stricture . The four technique areï¼š - balloon dilation - balloon dilation plus cryotherapy - balloon dilation plus spiculiform electrosurgery - balloon dilation plus mitomycin C injection
